title: 8/9/17 - North Korea: No-win situation for a world on edge ( Michael Malice joins Glenn)
description:
President Trump, North Korea and a world on edge ...'The likes of which we've never seen' ...What you need to know about North Korea ...How do we discuss North Korea and the world with our kids? ...Is Kim Jong Un crazy? ...This could mean the end of the western way of life ...North Korean expert Michael Malice discusses what that country is like ...How likely is nuclear war?
The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
